item.title: Steve Bannon Eyes 2028 Presidential Run, Feels JD Vance 'Not Tough Enough' For The Role: Report
item.description: Former White House Chief Strategist Steve Bannon is reportedly contemplating a run for the U.S. presidency in 2028. read more

item.title: SoundHound AI Stock Surges 20% Premarket After Record Q2 Revenue Beat
item.description: SoundHound AI stock jumped 20.15% in premarket trading on Friday to $12.88 after reporting record quarterly results that crushed estimates. read more

item.title: US Imposes Tariffs On Swiss Gold Imports, Threatening Global Bullion Market—Peter Schiff Tells Buyers To 'Better' Do This Now
item.description: The United States has imposed tariffs on Swiss gold imports, a move that could significantly disrupt the global bullion market. read more

item.title: JPMorgan Now Expects September Fed Cut Instead Of December—Jobless Claims Surge, Trump Nomination Adds New Twist
item.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. has moved up its forecast for the first Federal Reserve rate cut to September, abandoning its previous December timeline. read mo...
